synopsis.title: About the film
synopsis.content: HUNGER is a powerful documentary that explores the complex topic of mental health through intimate stories of individuals who have faced unprecedented challenges. The film follows their journeys from despair to hope, breaking down stigma and opening doors to dialogue about mental health in our society.
synopsis.quote: "Hunger is not just lack of food - it's hunger for understanding, connection, and hope."
